channel.title: Upgrading Vista Ultimate to Windows 7 Ultimate
channel.description: hey i was just wondering if i would loose any of my data/files/programs if i would pop in the windows7 disk and run the upgrade tool.. or would that basically do a clean install and i would loose all my data..? cause im not sure if it would upgrade it and erase my data or juss upgrade.. thanks

item.title: Upgrading Vista Ultimate to Windows 7 Ultimate
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

haha alrite bro thanks alot everyone… yeah ill just most likely do a clean install lol… i got a ton of extra useless shit that i really dont need…
thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrading Vista Ultimate to Windows 7 Ultimate
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Unhandled:

Upgrade doesn’t delete anything, however I find it’s always better to do a clean install.

i agree, formatting your drive has other benefits too, you find a lot of shit you really dont need but just have
